website_summaries.verdict: For shavers with dry or sensitive skin, this is definitely an aftershave balm to consider. Some may prefer the splash version's stronger fragrance, but the balm is better for skin maintenance.
pros: Reduces razor burn, protects sensitive skin
cons: Fragrance may not mesh well with some users' body chemistry

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but you don’t need much.
customer_reviews.text: I had noticed that I was experiencing more razor burn recently, possibly because I’m not shaving as much with restrictions on travel. This seems to have improved the shaving experience and is a nice luxury in the shaving process.
customer_reviews.author: Pharmboy

customer_reviews.title: The best for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply the best balm I have tried yet. Yes, it's 4-5 times the cost of Nivea which is good stuff, but Musgo is GREAT stuff. My face hasn't been this soft & smooth since I started shaving, and that's the honest truth. If you have dry or sensitive skin, Musgo aftershave balm is worth every penny. Do a proper prep, use a good blade & cream or soap, then follow with this. Your face will give you a high five, and I guarantee you'll be rubbing your face & neck all day admiring how soft & hydrated you feel.
customer_reviews.author: CigarSmoka

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Been using this after shave Balm for 2 years, and like it better than any other balm I’ve used. Feels great after a great shave.
customer_reviews.author: Millerilm1

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent too
customer_reviews.text: I could not live without this stuff. Healing & soothing to my sensitive skin. Prevents flaking in ears & eyebrows and around nose. Love the scent too.
customer_reviews.author: sherman miller

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. It smells great and as a balm it can't be beat. It is soothing to the skin after a shave. It is not sticky and the moisturizing effect lasts long after the product dries on the skin. Unfortunately the scent only lasts a short time but allows for an application of your favorite aftershave splash. I will definitely buy this (my new favorite ) again.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny C.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful balm
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredients in this balm...Smells good and works good too....smooth skin...
customer_reviews.author: Bird lady Pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the post DE Wet Shave
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to complete my DE shaving setup with the Proraso shave cream and this product really keeps me from getting the dreaded razor burn. It has a good smell (I'm not going to try to describe it) which is very light; almost imperceptible. It doesn't go on too greasy and there is no alcohol so there is no burn. It works very well and keeps my face moisturized as well. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: I'm still deciding if I like the gestalt fragrance created with my body chemistry
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the product or what it is intended to do. In fact, as an aftershave balm this stuff works very well indeed. I'm still deciding if I like the gestalt fragrance created with my body chemistry.
customer_reviews.author: Merle ApAmber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My wife and kids love the smell and I love the feel. I have not had any razor burns since using this product. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: splauber

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, soothing.  Your GF secretly wants you to buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a manly, subtle and earthy after shave balm. I wouldn't characterize it as a "dark" scent, just straightforward and substantial. Musgo Real is really enjoyable. The scent is just like the shave cream, which I had first and also recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James J

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy your shave!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of Musgo products in general. This aftershave lotion is a winner. Really soothes and doesn't smother you in funk. A little dab will do you, so just use a drop or three to get'r done.
customer_reviews.author: USERBOSCO

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic aftershave lotion.
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best aftershave lotion ever made. It soothes and heals, and leaves the skin feeling and looking great. I even use it as a moisterizer on my forehead.The scent is delicious but does not overwhelm. Truly extraordinary.
customer_reviews.author: dawghausriley

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing Balm
customer_reviews.text: This is a very moisturizing balm. I expect for this to come in handy to treat during the cold, dry winter months. Nice scent as well.
customer_reviews.author: W. Mark Farrell

customer_reviews.title: So wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This item further enhances the classic scent with another layer of fragrance and decadence. So wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: PamC

customer_reviews.title: Like, not love
customer_reviews.text: If you like the Musgo Real shaving cream, this is a complement to it. I tend to like balm aftershaves, and with so many available, this one fell somewhere in the middle for me.
customer_reviews.author: Spartakiss

customer_reviews.title: Classic Barbershop scent.......
customer_reviews.text: This aftershave balm is perfect, it's lightly scented but it still last a few hours and the scent reminds me of going to the barbershop as a kid. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great product especially if you have sensitive skin as I do.
customer_reviews.author: PADDYG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this after shave balm. Amazon was the cheapest we could find it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: my partner loved it
customer_reviews.text: my partner loved it - perfect gift for him to go with all the accessories . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Emma the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great smelling and protects your face. Only a little is needed and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Beck

customer_reviews.title: Musgo Real after shave balm
customer_reviews.text: couldn'y live without this stuff. if you have scaling and cracking skin around ear, nose and eyebrows you need to get this
customer_reviews.author: sherman miller

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: He loves this. But, he's had to figure out how much NOT to use. It's so comforting after his wet shave that he's used more than he needs. Cracks me up!
customer_reviews.author: MariaA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soothing, mildly fragrant, works well with Musgo Real After Shave Classic Scent..
customer_reviews.author: Shoehorse

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on your skin, a premium product at a great price. Very nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: J. Afonso

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: This was an accidental order. I wanted to order the Musgo Real Aftershave splash and not the balm. It was my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: BALMTASTICAL!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it really is as amazing as all the reviews say. Super moisturizing, no residue, great smell, and gave me the power to wrestle a mountain lion on the way home from fighting forest fires around a lonely monastery where I converted all the nun's to nymphomaniacs in less than a fortnight. You too can have these miraculous powers if you buy Musgo Real after shave balm or my name isn't Dave "the nun breaker" Phillips.
customer_reviews.author: David Phillips

customer_reviews.title: If it says balm
customer_reviews.text: then I expect balm...and that is what one gets. A balm doesn't have a strong scent or a sharp scent that stays with you all day. I expect my skin to like it...I expect a mild but pleasant scent...i expect a bit of viscous(ness) but not enough to make my skin feel filmy and this doesn't. I am stingy with my five stars and look for reasons not to give them. However, I can't find any. I shave in the morning...apply the Musgo and never have to think about it again...just what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moore

customer_reviews.title: Yep
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time I shave. Especially essential in the winter, and also works great in a single application on really bad razor burn for the "against the grain" crowd. Only need a small dab, so it lasts a long time. Really good for sensitive skin and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Bdub

customer_reviews.title: Best Balm money can buy
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of different shaving balms over the years, and most of them don't seem to be up to the job -- except this one! Bar none, this is the best balm I've ever used, and I've been using it religiously for the last two years. Great scent and great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin J. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Classic and Sophisticated
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this aftershave and my husband is pleased with it too. It has a very classic, sophisticated scent that is not "old mannish". Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Best balm ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best balm I've ever tried for soothing a rough shave. As opposed to the almost overpowering splash, this has very little scent. Add a dab of the Musgo After Shave splash for a tad more scent.
customer_reviews.author: Furcifer

customer_reviews.title: The best balm on earth
customer_reviews.text: By far the best shave balm to grace this face. Over the years I have tried many products, only to be left wanting. This is the real deal, with the same quality that your grandfather used. I get many compliments from the ladies, as it's not your typical everyday overbearing smell. This is truly a manly, just left the barbershop and wrestled a bear on the way home smell.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Mitchell

product_meta.title: Musgo Real After Shave Balm (3.4 fl oz)
product_meta.description:
This woody oriental fragrance is a resolutely masculine scent. It blends the spicy notes of sandalwood and patchouli with the warmth of vanilla. Top Notes: Ylang-ylang and vetiver Heart Notes: Musk, patchouli and sandalwood Base Notes: Amber, vanilla and tonka

BRAND STORY
Claus Porto is a beauty, fragrance and lifestyle house born in 1887. Hand-crafted in Portugal for over a century, its products are wrapped in beautifully decorated packaging inspired by the brand’s extensive design portfolio.
